post.text: Donald Trump still refuses to admit President Obama was born in the United States.

comment.author: Shane
comment.text: What a pig!!! This is treason if I ever saw it! No wonder Putin loves him!!! He's destroying America and making it easier for Putin to re-assemble the Soviet Union!!!

replies.author: Amanda
replies.text: David Nicola LaMonica THESE MORONS DO NOT READ-THEY ARE POLLY PARROTS REPEATING WHATEVER HITLARY SAYS!
